title: Meditation: Vipassana - Seeing Life As It Is (2020-04-29)
itunes:title: Meditation: Vipassana - Seeing Life As It Is
description: Meditation: Vipassana - Seeing Life As It Is (2020-04-29) - This classic Buddhist meditation trains us to wake up out of thoughts and to attend to our changing experience with a balanced, clear and open presence.
